reviewText: We bought region 2 (non USA format) DVDs so we could finish this wonderful series.  It was bittersweet because most of the original actors have died and new ones have been added to the story line, but it's still a fun series and we're glad we purchased.  The DVDs worked flawlessly in our region-free player.
This completes my Library of Region 2 DVD discs for this show, works well for me in my home studio.
They were very prompt, and now, I have all of them! Very happy with it!
I have the entire series now.
it was a great series.  There last episode ends quietly, which fits.
Last series and not as good as as the rest of the series but still very enjoyable.
Alas, the IS "The Last of the Summer Wine." Still a good series up to the end. Thank goodness for a Region Free-NTSC/PAL DVD player.
This is a British Television Series that started in 1974 and is still going.  I have the complete series through 2008.  It is about retired citizens in England.  It is funny and I recommend it.
